words.def: A rearrangement of an older piece of music, possibly including various cosmetic changes.
a party of people assembled to promote sociability and communal activity
The pesticide and fire retardant  perchloropentacyclodecane that is a persistent, bioaccumulative, and toxic pollutant.
ice crystals forming a white deposit (especially on objects outside)
a soft wet area of low-lying land that sinks underfoot
an independent ruler or chieftain (especially in Africa or Arabia)
a commercially prepared mixture of dry ingredients
a male sovereign
County/City (Proper noun)
A Russian village community.
a recurring sleep state during which dreaming occurs
the shape of a raised edge of a more or less circular object
a strong emotion

a man who was formerly a certain woman's husband
the cardinal number that is the sum of ten and one
a quad with a square body
destruction of heart tissue resulting from obstruction of the blood supply to the heart muscle
